item.title: Tasty smoothie - no. 1
item.description: A simple recipe for a delicious smoothie. Ingredients: 50-80g yoghurt 100ml milk (regular, soy or oat etc.) 1 medium banana 1 passion fruit 1 small lime few raspberries few blueberries 2-4 strawberries water to top it up Extras: You might add: jam (for some extra flavour) ispaghula husk (e.g Fybogel orange flavour ) - for those with IBS
